description: Comprehensive checklist for SOC 2 report validation

rules.description: The audit period in the report must match exactly with the specified audit period
rules.explanation_template: The audit period in the report must be 'January 1, 2023 to December 31, 2023'. Found: {found_value}

rules.description: The report must contain the company name 'Acme Cloud Services, Inc.'
rules.explanation_template: The report must explicitly mention the company name 'Acme Cloud Services, Inc.'. This was found {found_count} times (required: at least 1).

rules.description: The report must contain a 'Management's Assertion' section
rules.explanation_template: The report must include a 'Management's Assertion' section as required by SOC 2 standards.

rules.description: The report must contain an 'Auditor's Opinion' section
rules.explanation_template: The report must include an 'Auditor's Opinion' section as required by SOC 2 standards.

rules.description: The report must address all five Trust Services Criteria: Security, Availability, Processing Integrity, Confidentiality, and Privacy
rules.explanation_template: The report must cover all five Trust Services Criteria. Found: {found_keywords}

rules.description: The report must mention specific encryption standards (AES-256 or TLS 1.2+)
rules.explanation_template: The report must specify encryption standards such as AES-256 or TLS 1.2. Found {found_count} mentions (required: at least 2).

rules.description: The report must mention multi-factor authentication (MFA) implementation
rules.explanation_template: The report must document multi-factor authentication controls. MFA must be mentioned at least once.

rules.description: The report must mention backup, disaster recovery, RTO, or RPO
rules.explanation_template: The report must include backup and recovery controls. Found {found_count} mentions (required: at least 2).

rules.description: The report must document role-based access control (RBAC) and principle of least privilege
rules.explanation_template: The report must describe access control mechanisms including RBAC and least privilege principle. Found {found_count} mentions (required: at least 2).

rules.description: The report must include a summary of control tests performed
rules.explanation_template: The report must document the testing performed on controls. Found {found_count} mentions (required: at least 2).

rules.description: The report must clearly state management's responsibilities for controls
rules.explanation_template: The report must clearly articulate management's responsibilities. This responsibility statement must be mentioned at least once.

rules.description: The report must have a report date specified
rules.explanation_template: The report must include a report date. This was found {found_count} times (required: at least 1).

rules.description: The report must include a conclusion section
rules.explanation_template: The report must include a Conclusion section summarizing the auditor's findings and opinions.

rules.description: The report should not contain obvious errors like incomplete sections or placeholder text
rules.explanation_template: The report contains {found_count} critical errors (placeholder text, incomplete sections, or TODOs found). This should be 0.
